analysis.description:
Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_contracts/0x444e1a528b4c546fdb83e4c1790e2aa452726ac3.sol#619-621) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_contracts/0x444e1a528b4c546fdb83e4c1790e2aa452726ac3.sol#620-621)
